name: JUMP (itch) (PlayWithAayan)
description:
This game is made in Pythons game library called Pygame.

Single player platformer game.

Play long enough to get XP points and earn bonus.

Multi level to earn high scores and lead against other players in leaderboard.

Access your account from anywhere now, with new Account System.

No internet ? No Problem ! Play Offline with new guest mode :) 

Infinite game play, You should only loose to win.

Contact : playwithaayan25@gmail.com

Latest Update 2.5.0.1:

  • Guest Mode
  • Account System Fixed
  • Bugs Fixed

Old Update 2.0.1.1 :

  • Major UI changes
  • Account System
  • More Options
  • Soundfx and Animations
  • XP System
  • Leaderboard Added
  • Smooth Gameplay
  • In-game build's and updates

Try the Game to explore more :)

Enter code jumpay to win free coins.
